title: Did Selena Quintanilla quit being Jehovah's Witnesses? - Quora

response.answer_text: From what I’ve read I’m not sure she is a baptised Jehovah’s witness. But I cannot be 100% certain of that. If she is then she has to answer to the elders and Jehovah for any immoral behaviour according to the Jehovah’s Witnesses and could be disfellowshipped. But she has to be baptised as a Jehovah’s Witness to be disfellowshipped. People can claim to be Jehovah’s Witnesses but if they are not baptised then they are not unless they are an unbaptised publisher whom the elders have approved as a publisher. Jehovah’s Witnesses do not approve of sex before marriage. I think confirmation as to all this would have to come from Serena herself.

At some point, she was not an active Jehovah’s Witness. There’s also a question on Quora, Was Selena a Jehovah's Witness? She was raised as a Witness and, to my knowledge, members of her family still are active Witnesses. But at some point during her career, she didn’t identify herself as a Witness. Further reading: r/exjw - Selena's dad is still a JW and doesn't want her birth or death celebrated.
No, she was studying the bible with Jehovah’s Witnesses at the time of her death. She was never baptized as one of Jehovah’s Witnesses.
